detectors.description:
OpenAddressLottery.participate() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_069.sol#31-59) compares to a boolean constant:

Deprecated standard detected s.component2 = uint256(block.blockhash(block.number - 1)) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_069.sol#88):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents

	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder.
It is used by:

detectors.description: Variable OpenAddressLottery.LuckyNumber (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_069.sol#15) is not in mixedCase

Reentrancy in OpenAddressLottery.participate() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_069.sol#31-59):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(win) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_069.sol#46)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reseed(SeedComponents(uint256(block.coinbase),block.difficulty,block.gaslimit,block.timestamp)) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_069.sol#51-58)
		- lastReseed = block.number (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_069.sol#75)
	- reseed(SeedComponents(uint256(block.coinbase),block.difficulty,block.gaslimit,block.timestamp)) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_069.sol#51-58)
		- secretSeed = uint256(keccak256()(components.component1,components.component2,components.component3,components.component4)) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_069.sol#67-74)
detectors.markdown:

	State variables written after the call(s):
